content:
UK Itinerary:
Day 1: Arrive in London and check into a hotel in the city center. Spend the afternoon exploring some of London's famous sights such as Buckingham Palace, the British Museum, and Big Ben. In the evening, head to a traditional English pub for dinner.

Day 2: Take a train to the Lake District and spend the day exploring the beautiful scenery and walking in the hills. Some popular walks include around Ullswater and up Helvellyn. In the evening, check into a cozy bed and breakfast.

Day 3: Start the day with a visit to the medieval town of Hawkshead, then continue on to Coniston Water for a boat trip. After some time on the water, visit the famous Beatrix Potter's Hill Top. Overnight in Windermere.

Day 4: Take a drive through the Yorkshire Dales, stopping for a hike in the beautiful Malham Cove. In the evening, check into a hotel in the historic city of York and explore the city's medieval streets.

Day 5: Return to London for a final day of sightseeing and shopping before departing.

Europe itinerary:
Day 1: Arrive in Paris and check into a hotel in the city center. Spend the afternoon exploring the famous sights such as the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame, and the Louvre. In the evening, head to a traditional French bistro for dinner.

Day 2: Take a train to the Loire Valley and spend the day exploring the beautiful châteaux and gardens. Some popular stops include Château de Chambord and Château de Chenonceau. In the evening, check into a hotel in the charming town of Amboise.

Day 3: Start the day with a visit to the picturesque village of St-Cirq-Lapopie, then continue on to the Dordogne region for a canoe trip on the Dordogne River. After some time on the water, visit the famous Lascaux II Cave. Overnight in Sarlat.

Day 4: Take a drive through the Pyrenees, stopping for a hike in the beautiful Ordesa y Monte Perdido National Park. In the evening, check into a hotel in the historic city of Huesca.

Day 5: Return to Paris for a final day of sightseeing and shopping before departing.

Please note that this itinerary is sample and can be adjusted as per your preference. It is always good to do further research and make a final plan based on the current situation and travel restriction.
